_comment_version_file: File that stores the current version string (default: VERSION)
_comment_changelog: Generate CHANGELOG.md on bump. Set false to disable, or use {"file": "CHANGES.md", "ignore_prefixes": ["chore:"]}
_comment_files: Optional: glob patterns for files whose changes trigger automatic patch bumps on merge. Example: "files": ["src/**/*.py", "lib/**/*.js"]
_comment_updates: Optional: files to update with new version on bump. "file" replaces entire file; ["pattern"] does find-and-replace. Example: "updates": {"setup.py": ["version = "]}
_comment_subdirs: Optional: add subdirectory configs as top-level keys for monorepo support. Tags become <subdir>/vX.Y.Z. Example: "frontend": {"version_file": "frontend/VERSION", "files": ["frontend/**/*.js"]}
